attributes.action: We, the British voters, demand an immediate general election to decide our fate.
attributes.additional_details: We have some of the least suited and least able politicians damaging our democracy and institutions with ignorance and incompetence. Give the public an immediate general election to decide whether we wish to retain a no deal option, or whether we wish to surrender to the mercy of the EU.  All the main parties have claimed the only solution is to pass the decision back to the people, it's now time to make good on that statement and give us an election without further delay or deception.
attributes.background: Parliament are hording and corrupting power in a vulgar display of national harm. We, the public, demand a say in how to proceed with the withdrawal from the EU.  It's time to decide whether to retain a no deal option to force a deal from the EU, or continue onwards with indecision and no resolution
